live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
43524.summary: Some customers in the Ranchlands area of Medicine Hat are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
43524.title: Nov 1 – Medicine Hat (Ranchlands) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
